price: 31. (idinkoo) Alle u noqon oo toobad keen ah, dhowrana (xilkuu idin saaray), oo ooga salaadda, hana ka mid ahaannina Mushrikiinta.
arabic: ۞ مُنِيبِينَ إِلَيۡهِ وَٱتَّقُوهُ وَأَقِيمُواْ ٱلصَّلَوٰةَ وَلَا تَكُونُواْ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: munībīna ilayhi wa-ittaqūhu wa-aqīmū al-ṣalata walā takūnū mina al-mush'rikīna
